context_bundle.summary: Everything MCP Server - C# MCP wrapping voidtools Everything for instant file search. Uses EverythingSearchClient NuGet (pure .NET IPC, no native DLL). 8 tools: search, search_ext, search_in_folder, search_folders, recent, search_size, find_duplicates, status.

onboarding.quick_start: Location: C:\MCP-Servers\everything-mcp\EverythingMCP. Built with ModelContextProtocol NuGet + EverythingSearchClient. Requires Everything.exe running. Config in claude_desktop_config.json. Tools: everything_search (wildcards, ext:, regex), everything_search_ext, everything_search_in_folder, everything_search_folders, everything_recent, everything_search_size, everything_find_duplicates, everything_status.
known_errors: Everything NOT available - ensure Everything.exe running
Platform warnings CA1416 - Windows-only, safe to ignore
